original_text: You must wait outside the house. Then your neighbour can bring out what he has chosen to give you.
korean_text: 너는 밖에 서 있고 네게 꾸는 자가 전당물을 밖으로 가지고 나와서 네게 줄 것이며

sentences.original_text: You must wait outside the house.
Then your neighbour can bring out
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너의 이웃이 가져올 수 있다

sentences.original_text: what he has chosen to give you.
